hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
set -e cat > unstable.chroot/root/run.sh <<GLOBALEOF set -e set -v echo "deb http://deb.debian.org/debian experimental main">/etc/apt/sources.list.d/exp.list apt-get update apt-get install -y gcc-9 g++-9 mercurial -t experimental if test ! -d /root/firefox-gcc-last; then hg clone https://hg.mozilla.org/mozilla-central/ /root/firefox-gcc-last fi cd /root/firefox-gcc-last rm -f third_party/rust/lalrpop/src/parser/lrgrammar.rs cat .mozconfig
cat > .mozconfig << EOF ac_add_options --enable-debug ac_add_options --enable-warnings-as-errors mk_add_options AUTOCLOBBER=1 #ac_add_options --disable-rust
#mk_add_options MOZ_MAKE_FLAGS="-j1" CC=gcc-9 CXX=g++-9
#export CFLAGS="-Wduplicated-branches" #-Wformat-overflow=level" #export CXXFLAGS="-Wduplicated-branches" #-Wformat-overflow=level" export CXXFLAGS="-Wno-error=class-memaccess -Wno-error=format-overflow -Wno-error=stringop-truncation -Wno-stringop-overflow -Wno-error=attributes -Wno-error=deprecated-copy -Wno-error=pessimizing-move -Wno-error=type-limits" export CFLAGS="-Wno-error=class-memaccess -Wno-error=format-overflow -Wno-error=stringop-truncation -Wno-stringop-overflow -Wno-error=type-limits" EOF
./mach clobber hg pull -u hg update -r default export PATH=/root/.cargo/bin/:$PATH rustup update cargo install cbindgen --force ./mach --log-no-times build #-v rm -rf obj-x86_64-pc-linux-gnu/
GLOBALEOF sudo chroot unstable.chroot/ ./root/run.sh exit 0
